name: GDDL Integration
description: Displays GDDL tiers of demons along with enjoyment ratings

issues.info: You can submit an <cr>bug report</c>/<cj>feature request</c> directly to the mod's repo here

move-button-to-level-name.name: Move tier button to level name
move-button-to-level-name.description: By default, the tier button is situated to the left of the demon face, if this is toggled on it'll be moved right to the level name.

pos-next-to-level-name.name: Position of the button next to the level name
pos-next-to-level-name.description: According to the slider position (on the left or the right side of the level name), works only if the setting above is ticked.

move-gddl-search-button-down.name: Move GDDL Search button down
move-gddl-search-button-down.description: Moves the GDDL Search button down a set number of spots, useful if you have Loquibot or other mods that also place buttons in the search menu which can result in buttons overlapping

legacy-gddl-tier-label.name: Old GDDL Tier label
legacy-gddl-tier-label.description: Changes the tier button on the level info page into a clickable label, just like it used to be in the early versions of this mod

legacy-gddl-tier-offset.name: Old GDDL Tier label offset
legacy-gddl-tier-offset.description: Moves the old tier label down by the specified number of lines, useful if it collides with other objects placed in the same area, -1 puts it above the demon face
